Text.Page:
It's a conspiracy, I tell you! A conspiracy!

I don't know if they caused it. Maybe they're just feeding it.

Haha! Feeding!"Uh..."

The {@LinkCreature:15#1#lunatic yeomans} and {@LinkCreature:15#2#insane farmers} from that Paraanon cult are feeding the crazies. Crazy or not, you can't live without food.

Kill the farmers. Done talking, .

Do it.

Excellent.

I'll go check our food. We have to protect our purity of essence...
This is vital, <PCNAME>. Those farmers are spreading the disease!
